title: The Phantom
description: Legend tells of a young boy who watched his father die at the hands of the Singh Brotherhood, a gang of pirates. later on the skull of his father's killer, the boy swore vengeance--dedicating his life and the lives of his descendants to fighting his life and the lives of his descendants to fighting piracy, greed, injustice, and cruelty in all its forms. He was the first.
author: Rob MacGregor
